name: Welcome To... Chichester 1: Start Of The End
name_original: Welcome To... Chichester 1: Start Of The End
description:
STORY

When the self-proclaimed "best secret agent in the world" starts his week-long holiday, he is anticipation nothing more than a simple hiking holiday with a grizzled guide up an unnamed mountain. Unfortunately for him, his enemies decided that would be far too boring...

DETAILS

This is a very short, comedic visual novel featuring an interesting array of characters, and an exciting story that will hopefully be expanded to a larger series.

Features include :

- Visit Chichester (not personally though)
- The ability to give your character a name! Wow!
- Comedy
- Quirky characters

Features music by Kevin MacLeod (Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0) and some graphics from Pexels, as well as the standard characters from Visual Novel Maker

Designed as a short visual novel test, with the possibility of continuing the story if people like it.
